example.name: cause
example.text: Income distribution often stratifies a society.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: the socially stratified Paiwan tribe has a wide range of cloting and cloth colors.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'stratify' based on frame file for 'activate'. Verbnet class 45.4, other members include activate, age, balance, blur, darken, hasten, laminate, magnetize, revive, ripen, sicken, stabilize, sour, tilt, unwind, whiten.
